Hello everyone! I've joined the new list.... Sorry if this post will 
be short and uninformative... Just wanted to let everyone know I'm 
glad there's a new list and that after I return to the country after 
this vacation of mine, I'll be posting better stuff. See you all! 
Hopefully soon.
